game.name: Expedition to Madness
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Co-op cosmic horror game for up to 4 players. Explore dimensions inspired by Lovecraft’s tales, gather primordial energy, extract alien artifacts, investigate paranormal phenomena, and keep the wormhole open… or be lost forever.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Co-op cosmic horror game for up to 4 players. Explore dimensions inspired by Lovecraft’s tales, gather primordial energy, extract alien artifacts, investigate paranormal phenomena, and keep the wormhole open… or be lost forever.
